Author: sapphosviolet
Text: I feel this. I moved out of my parents house a month ago so I don’t have a scale anymore and in a lot of ways it’s been nice but now every time I go to target I stand in the scale aisle for a good 10 min. agonizing about which is worse, knowing or not knowing. you could always ask your doctor if you could turn around on the scale and not to say your weight out loud if it would make things worse.
